education.institution: The University of Cambridge, United Kingdom

projects.name: Fault-Tolerant Quantum Computation
projects.summary: Essay on the threshold theorem and the overhead of fault-tolerant quantum computing.

projects.name: Fusion-Based Foliated Quantum Codes
projects.summary: Proposed an algorithm that generalizes the construction of arbitrary foliated CSS codes by fusing resource states.

projects.name: Union-Find Decoding on the XZZX Surface Code
projects.summary: Implemented and benchmarked the union-find decoder on the XZZX surface code and proposed a modification to the decoder that could offer improved thresholds.

projects.name: An Introduction to Quantum Error Correction and Decoding Algorithms
projects.summary: A review of quantum error correction with an emphasis on decoding.

projects.name: Fault-Tolerant Error Correction Using Optimized Linear Codes
projects.summary: Optimized the number of measurements required for fault-tolerant syndrome extractionon a classical code and numerically simulated the schemeâ€™s performance.
